Title: Browse services & doctors
Description: As a Guest, I want to browse available services and doctors’ profiles so that I can decide whether to register.

Title: Book appointment
Description: As a Customer, I want to book an appointment for a selected pet, date/time and doctor so that my pet is seen promptly.

Title: Manage appointments
Description: As a Customer, I want to view, reschedule or cancel my upcoming appointments so that I stay flexible.

Title: Daily agenda view
Description: As Staff, I want an agenda view of all appointments for today so that I can prepare rooms and equipment.

Title: Block personal slots
Description: As a Doctor, I want to block personal time slots so that clients cannot book me when I’m unavailable.

Title: Record consultation notes
Description: As a Doctor, I want to record examination notes, diagnoses and prescriptions during a consultation so that future care is informed.

Title: Attach lab results
Description: As a Doctor, I want to attach lab results (PDF, image) to a visit record so that evidence is preserved.

Title: View visit summaries
Description: As a Customer, I want to read my pet’s past visit summaries so that I can understand its medical history.

Title: EMR access control
Description: As an Admin, I want EMR access to be role-restricted and audited so that we comply with data-privacy laws.

Title: Create vaccination schedule
Description: As a Doctor, I want to create a vaccination schedule for each puppy/kitten so that reminders are automated.

Title: Mark doses administered
Description: As a Customer, I want to tick off each administered dose so that the tracker stays accurate.

Title: List due follow-ups
Description: As Staff, I want to list today’s due follow-up visits so that I can call owners who missed reminders.

Title: Appointment reminder email
Description: As a Customer, I want to receive an email 24 h before an appointment so that I don’t forget.

Title: Low-stock vaccine alert
Description: As Staff, I want the system to notify us if stock for a scheduled vaccine is low so that we can reorder.

Title: Manage services & prices
Description: As an Admin, I want to CRUD service items and prices so that the web site is always up-to-date.

Title: Auto-decrement medicine stock
Description: As Staff, I want medicine stock to decrement automatically after a prescription is dispensed so that inventory stays accurate.

Title: Customer registration & pet profiles
Description: As a Customer, I want to register with email/phone, link multiple pets and upload photos so that my account is complete.

Title: Merge duplicate customers
Description: As a Manager, I want to merge duplicate customer profiles so that records are clean.

Title: Onboard new veterinarian
Description: As an Admin, I want to onboard a new vet with their qualifications and working hours so that they appear in booking.

Title: Doctor daily caseload view
Description: As a Doctor, I want to see my case list for the day so that I can prepare.

Title: Rate visit & comment
Description: As a Customer, I want to rate my visit on 1-5 stars and leave a comment so that others know service quality.

Title: Moderate feedback
Description: As a Manager, I want to moderate abusive comments so that the site remains professional.

Title: Daily clinic summary
Description: As a Manager, I want a daily summary of visits, revenue and cancellations so that I can make staffing decisions.

Title: Doctor monthly performance
Description: As a Doctor, I want to track my monthly caseload and revenue share.

Title: Pet health timeline chart
Description: As a Customer, I want a timeline chart of my pet’s weight and vaccine history.

Title: Flexible sign-up / sign-in
Description: As a Guest, I want to sign up or sign in with Google / email / phone OTP so that onboarding is easy.

Title: Role-based permissions
Description: As an Admin, I want fine-grained role permissions so that sensitive data is protected.

Title: EMR audit logging
Description: As a Security Auditor, I want all EMR views and edits logged so that breaches can be investigated.
